subject: Attn: Account Holder :
body:
Attn: Account Holder :
This is to notify you that a new development has been made today in
which the Bank of America has been holding your funds all this while
because the BANK LOST YOUR CONTACT, Now the Bank has been ordered to
release your overdue FUND to you.
We have made several contacts to reach you to claim your out standing
payment, but we did not hear from you till now, so I hope you will
respond and contact us for this notice to claim your funds.
We the Bankers has created an online Bank account on your behalf and
the online Bank account has been funded with the total sum of
36.800,000.00 USD in which you would be able to withdraw any amount of
money daily from the online account, Please what Ever you want to Ask
make sure that You Copy this Email Below and send Me
Email.(
boabankofamerica75@gmail.com
)
Below are the online bank account details
Welcome! To - BANK OF AMERICA Online Plc Secure Account Page
Payment Activate 2023-04-05
Created Opened Account// 36.800, 000, 00 USD
Balance 36.800, 000, 00 USD
Sort Code. 00169381101-43372 1020-03-8733
Swift Code PNBPUS33
Account Number 1010169857504
The bank has also stated that you would be able to start accessing the
online bank account once the transfer code has been issued to you and
this code will be issued to you, So send the following details to me
as soon as you get this mail.
Your full name:
home or office address:
phone number:
your Country:
Copy of your ID Card:
Your Age:
Marital Status:
Treat as urgent as I will be waiting for the details To This Email in
Bracket (
boabankofamerica75@gmail.com
)
THANKS FOR YOUR COOPERATION.
Respectively Yours
Mr. Brian Moynihan
DIRECTOR BANK OF AMERICA.

subject: Re:    Attn: Account Holder :
body:
Hello Mr. Brian Moynihan,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in trying to contact me regarding my funds. Can you please provide me with more details about the situation? How exactly did the bank lose my contact information?

I am interested in learning more about the online bank account that has been created on my behalf. Could you explain how it works and what steps I need to take to access and withdraw funds from it?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the transfer code that needs to be issued to me. What is its purpose and how can I obtain it?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Rudolf
